languages.text: "Завет Паутины учит не сожалеть и не колебаться. Но я не думала, что однажды... сделать выбор будет так больно. Я сделала, что должно... Но это не утешает боль. Я знаю, что он в дланях Неумирающего, но это не уменьшает горе".

traits.locale_text: "Я знаю, что сделала то, что должно, но это не делает боль менее острой. Я знаю, что теперь он в дланях Неумирающего, но это не уменьшает мое горе. Анн'шини учит нас о жизни без сожалений. О долге без сомнений. Но я не думала, что однажды... сделать правильный выбор будет так тяжело".

languages.text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us never to regret or hesitate. But I could never have imagined that I would one day have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."
languages.original_text: "Завет Паутины учит не сожалеть и не колебаться. Но я не думала, что однажды... сделать выбор будет так больно. Я сделала, что должно... Но это не утешает боль. Я знаю, что он в дланях Неумирающего, но это не уменьшает горе".

traits.locale_text: "Ahn'shini teaches us never to regret or hesitate. But I could not imagine that one day... I would have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."

"Ahn'shini teaches us never to regret or hesitate. But I could not imagine that one day... I would have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."

"The Tenets of the Web teach us never to regret or hesitate. But I could never have imagined that I would one day have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."

"The Tenets of the Web teach us never to regret or hesitate. But I could never have imagined that I would one day have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."

"The Tenets of the Web teach us never to regret or hesitate. But I could never have imagined that I would one day have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."

"The Tenets of the Web teach us never to regret or hesitate. But I could never have imagined that I would one day have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."

languages.text: « Les Préceptes de la Toile nous enseignent à proscrire hésitations et regrets. Mais je n'aurais jamais imaginé devoir un jour prendre une décision aussi douloureuse. J'ai fait ce que je devais faire... sans que cette conviction n'apaise ma souffrance. Je sais bien qu'il est désormais entre les mains de l'Immortel, mais je pleure sa disparition. »
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us never to regret or hesitate. But I could never have imagined that I would one day have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."

traits.locale_text: « Les Préceptes de la Toile nous enseignent à proscrire hésitations et regrets. Mais je n'aurais jamais imaginé devoir un jour prendre une décision aussi douloureuse. J'ai fait ce que je devais faire... sans que cette conviction n'apaise ma souffrance. Je sais bien qu'il est désormais entre les mains de l'Immortel, mais je pleure sa disparition. »

languages.text: «La Doctrina de la Red nos enseña a no arrepentirnos ni tener dudas, pero jamás hubiera imaginado que tendría que tomar una decisión tan dolorosa. He hecho lo que había que hacer... pero mi dolor no cesa. Sé que ahora está en manos del Inmortal, pero no hace más fácil lidiar con la pena».
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us never to regret or hesitate. But I could never have imagined that I would one day have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."

traits.locale_text: «La Doctrina de la Red nos enseña a no arrepentirnos ni tener dudas, pero jamás hubiera imaginado que tendría que tomar una decisión tan dolorosa. He hecho lo que había que hacer... pero mi dolor no cesa. Sé que ahora está en manos del Inmortal, pero no hace más fácil lidiar con la pena».

languages.text: 「ウェブの信条では、後悔やためらいは決してしないようにと説いています。ですがこんな辛い選択を迫られる日が来るなんて。我はなすべきことをしました…とはいえ痛みは消えません。あの人が不死の者の手の中にいるのだと分かっていても、悲しみは癒えないのです」
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us never to regret or hesitate. But I could never have imagined that I would one day have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェブの信条では、後悔やためらいは決してしないようにと説いています。ですがこんな辛い選択を迫られる日が来るなんて。我はなすべきことをしました…とはいえ痛みは消えません。あの人が不死の者の手の中にいるのだと分かっていても、悲しみは癒えないのです」

languages.text: “织血罗网的教义要求我们永远不要后悔，永远不要犹豫，但我之前从来没想象过，有朝一日我居然会做出如此痛苦的抉择。我做了该做的事情……但这根本无法平息我的痛苦。我知道他去了不死神皇身边，但这也根本无法缓解我的哀恸。”
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us never to regret or hesitate. But I could never have imagined that I would one day have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."

traits.locale_text: “织血罗网的教义要求我们永远不要后悔，永远不要犹豫，但我之前从来没想象过，有朝一日我居然会做出如此痛苦的抉择。我做了该做的事情……但这根本无法平息我的痛苦。我知道他去了不死神皇身边，但这也根本无法缓解我的哀恸。”

languages.text: "Die Grundsätze des Netzes lehren uns, niemals zu bereuen oder zu zögern. Doch ich hätte mir niemals vorstellen können, dass ich eines Tages eine solch schmerzliche Entscheidung würde treffen müssen. Ich habe getan, was ich tun musste ... Doch das lindert den Schmerz nicht. Ich weiß, er ruht nun in den Händen des Todlosen, doch das lindert die Trauer nicht."
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us never to regret or hesitate. But I could never have imagined that I would one day have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."

traits.locale_text: "Die Grunfsätze des Netzes lehren uns, niemals zu bereuen oder zu zögern. Doch ich hätte mir niemals vorstellen können, dass ich eines Tages eine solch schmerzliche Entscheidung würde treffen müssen. Ich habe getan, was ich tun musste ... Doch das lindert den Schmerz nicht. Ich weiß, er ruht nun in den Händen des Todlosen, doch das lindert die Trauer nicht."

languages.text: "Ağ'ın İlkeleri, bize pişmanlık duymamayı ve tereddüt etmemeyi öğretir. Ancak bir gün böylesine acı verecek bir seçim yapacağım aklımın ucundan bile geçmemişti. Yapılması gerekeni yaptım fakat... Acım hafiflemiyor. Onun artık Ölmeyen'in ellerinde olduğunu bilsem de kederim dinmek bilmiyor."
languages.original_text: "The Tenets of the Web teach us never to regret or hesitate. But I could never have imagined that I would one day have to make a choice this painful. I did what had to be done... But that does not quell the pain. I know he is in the Undying One's hands, but that does not soothe the grief."
